description: SRE have noticed that your cluster was deleted from the IaaS infrastructure. The cluster cannot be restored, please take action to delete this cluster. In the future when you need to delete a cluster, please follow the process outlined in the product documentation: https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_openshift_service_on_aws/4/html/install_rosa_classic_clusters/rosa-sts-deleting-cluster#.
